body_html: I am referring to RdmaTensorBuffer::SendNextItem()，where cb in channel_->adapter_->worker_env_>rendezvous_mgr->RecvLocalAsync(step_id, parsed, cb) will get status of RecvLocalAsync，if RecvLocalAsync failed, I think the receiver is expecting to be notified ? @junshi15
body_text: I am referring to RdmaTensorBuffer::SendNextItem()，where cb in channel_->adapter_->worker_env_>rendezvous_mgr->RecvLocalAsync(step_id, parsed, cb) will get status of RecvLocalAsync，if RecvLocalAsync failed, I think the receiver is expecting to be notified ? @junshi15
body: I am referring to `RdmaTensorBuffer::SendNextItem()`，where `cb` in `channel_->adapter_->worker_env_>rendezvous_mgr->RecvLocalAsync(step_id, parsed, cb)` will get status of `RecvLocalAsync`，if `RecvLocalAsync` failed, I think the receiver is expecting to be notified ? @junshi15
